articles.content: An Uber customer from Chandigarh was recently granted a compensation of Rs 10,000 after he was charged Rs 1,334 for 8.83 km for a ride on August 6, 2021. The Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission of… [+2170 chars]

articles.title: Flipkart To Pay Man Rs 10,000 For Harassment After Cancelled iPhone Order - NDTV
articles.description: A consumer disputes redressal commission here found Flipkart guilty of adopting unfair trade practices and ordered it to pay a customer Rs 10,000 for the mental harassment he suffered after it cancelled his iPhone order.
articles.content:
The detailed order was available on Sunday.

articles.title: Indian Finance Minister Says Crypto Assets Cannot Be Currencies — Expects 'Some Framework Emerging' From G20 Discussion – Regulation Bitcoin News - Bitcoin.com News
articles.description: Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman says it is the position of the Indian government that crypto assets cannot be currencies.
